channel.title: How do you become a community member?
channel.description:
Sorry if this is a nooby question, but how do you actually become a community member.
Do you have to make a certain amount of posts or what?

item.title: How do you become a community member?
item.dc:creator: @Starblaster100 Starblaster100
item.description:
@Starblaster100 wrote:

sdcit:

I’m a higher degree case that JME is describing xD. I don’t care that much about rep here. And why did Mopar make it admin approve? Is it because of the .org thing?

I made it admin approval, Yup, because of the .org thing.

And because i ahve caught a few people cheating rep. Note to all: if i do find you cheating rep, then i’ll just reset your rep count

Read full topic
item.source: How do you become a community member?

item.title: How do you become a community member?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Because, he is a community member on kaitnieks.

Read full topic

item.title: How do you become a community member?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

And because you’ll probably be wondering why people like me who have less then 50 rep and still are Community Members, well it’s because we were community members on kaitnieks forums.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you become a community member?

item.title: How do you become a community member?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Rep does not matter. Rep is only an idea for Admins to decide wether the play should be a community member. I have seen a lot of people with low rep but they are community member (some are non-Kaitnieks.) All you want to do is help everyone that needs it and you should be good.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you become a community member?

item.title: How do you become a community member?

item.description:
@ada wrote:

Thanks for that
Ill rep you now

Read full topic
item.source: How do you become a community member?

item.title: How do you become a community member?
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

just be helpful and you’ll get it(from the few that actually give it). helpful and nice is the best way to go to get rep

Read full topic
item.source: How do you become a community member?

item.title: How do you become a community member?
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

[quote=“ada, post:3, topic:33024”][quote author=therealjdb link=topic=47704.msg585529#msg585529 date=1165569192]
you need 50+ rep then you pm an admin and they evaluate your rep to see if you cheated etc… and then you either become one or not and have your rep reset
[/quote]

So I’ll never become one then :). I never get rep[/quote]
Just help out around the forum, you will get rep eventually. Community Member doesn’t really matter that much anyway…

Read full topic
item.source: How do you become a community member?
